[i]Timerra's Retainer[/i] – Whenever a creature attacks one of your opponents, it gains trample until end of turn.
[i]Knightly Escort[/i] – {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature that is attacking one of your opponents.
[i]Desert Wolves[/i] – {1}{G}{W}: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Activate this ability only if a creature you don't control attacked an opponent this turn.
